hero.title:
Premium Coconut Shell
for Global Industries
hero.subtitle: PT. Princess Jaya Abadi: Trusted partner for sustainably sourced coconut shell and derivatives from Indonesia—clean, consistent, export-ready.

mission.label: Our Purpose
mission.heading: Delivering Indonesian Coconut Shell to the World
mission.quote: To be a leading exporter of coconut shell and its derivatives—prioritizing sustainability, reliable quality, and long-term partnerships with growers and manufacturers.
points: Supply clean, dry coconut shell that meets international specifications.
Promote ethical sourcing and waste-to-value utilization.
Ensure consistent grading, moisture control, and on-time shipments.
Strengthen local coconut communities through fair and transparent trade.

about.label: Why Choose Us?
about.heading: The Princess Jaya Abadi Advantage
about.description: We specialize in the export of coconut shell and downstream products. From raw shell to carbonized shell for briquette and activated carbon feedstock, each batch is screened, cleaned, and documented for traceability—ensuring smooth export and dependable performance.

features.title: Sustainable Sourcing
features.description: Collected from trusted copra and coconut processors—turning agricultural by-product into high-value materials.

features.title: Consistent Quality
features.description: Strict control on moisture, ash, impurities, and size distribution to match buyer specifications.

features.title: Clean Processing
features.description: Washing, drying, screening, and metal detection as required; carbonization with controlled parameters.

features.title: Export-Ready Documentation
features.description: COO, MSDS (where applicable), test reports, and packing lists prepared in advance for customs efficiency.

features.title: Transparent Operations
features.description: Pre-shipment inspection, photos/videos of loading, and responsive after-sales support.

product.label: Our Coconut Shell Products
product.heading: Raw Shell, Carbonized Shell & Derivatives
product.description: Versatile materials for briquette manufacturing, activated carbon production, biomass energy, filtration media, and various industrial applications. Private labeling and custom specs available upon request.

items.title: Raw Coconut Shell
items.description: Clean, sun/oven-dried shells with controlled moisture and minimal pith—ideal for briquette and charcoal feedstock.

items.title: Carbonized Coconut Shell
items.description: Uniformly carbonized shell with low ash and high fixed carbon—perfect precursor for briquettes and activated carbon.

items.title: Granulated/Crushed Shell
items.description: Screened size fractions for filtration media, abrasive applications, and composite fillers.

quality.label: Our Commitment to Quality
quality.heading: Specification-Driven, Tested, and Traceable
quality.intro: Quality is engineered at every step—from sourcing and pre-cleaning to drying and carbonization. We align parameters with buyer requirements to secure consistent downstream performance.
points: Moisture, ash, volatile matter, and fixed carbon monitored per batch (for carbonized shell).
Metal and foreign matter control with screening and inspection.
Size grading tailored to briquette presses and reactor inputs.
Full batch traceability with documented QC checkpoints.
quality.conclusion: You receive stable, specification-matched coconut shell materials ready for industrial use and export.

usp.heading: Why Partner with PT. Princess Jaya Abadi?

items.title: Export-Ready Packaging
items.description: Durable PP woven bags, jumbo bags, or pallets—optimized for sea freight and safe handling.

items.title: Tight QC & Grading
items.description: Moisture control, screening, and uniform carbonization for predictable performance.

items.title: Efficient Logistics
items.description: Reliable scheduling, load planning, and container optimization for global routes.

items.title: Community Impact
items.description: Value-add for coconut farmers and processors through circular, low-waste supply chains.

exportDestination.title: Global Reach of Our Coconut Shell
exportDestination.regions: Asia, Europe, America, Middle East, Australia
exportDestination.paragraph1: From Indonesia to the world, our coconut shell materials serve briquette makers, activated carbon producers, and biomass users across multiple continents.
exportDestination.paragraph2: A strong logistics network and experienced export team ensure timely, efficient deliveries to Asia, Europe, America, the Middle East, and Australia.

news.label: Latest Updates
news.heading: News & Insights on Coconut Shell Materials
news.description: Follow industry trends, specification know-how, and PJ Abadi’s milestones in carbonized shell and value-added products.

team.label: Our Dedicated Team
team.heading: Specialists Behind the Quality
team.description: Meet the sourcing, production, and QA experts who keep every shipment aligned with your specs.

location.label: Find Us Here
location.heading: Head Office & Processing Hub
location.description: Located in Lampung, Indonesia—close to major coconut processing centers for steady raw material flow and efficient export preparation.

cta.heading: Ready to Source Premium Coconut Shell?
cta.description: Connect with PT. Princess Jaya Abadi today. From raw shell to carbonized material and graded fractions—we support your production with consistent quality and complete export service.

footer.shippingDesc: Orders packed in PP woven/jumbo bags or pallets. Standard dispatch within 2–3 weeks after confirmation.
footer.deliveryDesc: Worldwide delivery via trusted freight forwarders with sea and, if needed, air options.
footer.returnsDesc: Please confirm specifications before purchase. Industrial goods returns are limited and subject to prior agreement.
footer.subscribeDesc: Subscribe for updates on coconut shell availability, specs, and market insights.
footer.headline: Let’s Talk — Chat on WhatsApp
